attributes.background: While Mr. Davies was in charge of Standard Chartered Bank in China, StanChart Beijing Branch financed the export Letter of Credit for "82mm gun barrels" to Iran in August 2000.  This is against UN Sanctions in place at the time.  Mr. Rolf Berweger, Ms. Lorna Fu, Ms. Joyce Wong had full knowledge of this activity. In October 2000, StanChart Shenzhen Branch laundered "on shore" money in its role as the "B Share" Clearing Bank.  The police arrived to investigate Zhuhai Securities which was putting illegal funds into the B Share stock market.  Mr. Robert Ip of StanChart Hong Kong has full knowledge of this episode.
